title: 767: BITCOIN CRASH BLACK FRIDAY DEAL!! PLAN B: NOVEMBER $98K BTC TARGET MAY BE FLOOR MODELS FIRST MISS!!
description:
Black Friday is living up to its name in crypto this year as both Bitcoin and many altcoins are trading at their lowest in six weeks.

Bitcoin will have to surge by 80% in the next four days to reach the $98,000 BTC target set up by Plan B's floor model.

Plan B admitted that his worst-case scenario in terms of price is about to be proven wrong for the first time.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: BITCOIN CRASH BLACK FRIDAY DEAL!! PLAN B: NOVEMBER $98K BTC TARGET MAY BE FLOOR MODELS FIRST MISS!!
itunes:author: Justin Verrengia
itunes:subtitle: With Bitcoin down about 25% from all-time highs, this is a golden opportunity to “buy the dip,” analysts argue. Black Friday is living up to its name in crypto this year as both Bitcoin and many altcoins are trading at their lowest in six weeks....
